item.description:
This is a great short hike, approximately 1 1/4 miles long. It has a relatively steep incline, going up several hundred feet in that mile+. Please see the website below for more details and directions to the hike. We will meet at the base of the trail at 10:00am. It's fairly obvious where to meet, but in case any one gets lost the contact phone number is my cell phone (Beth). See you there!

There is a geocache in the vicinity of the tower, which we will be looking for. Anyone unfamiliar with geocaching, take a look here for more info:

http://www.geocaching...

For more information, see http://dep.state.ct.u...

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Heublein Tower Hike
